response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and quality, we're considering an offer of $12,000 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the high demand and limited availability of this item. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.", "product_price": 12000}
